title: The Undercover Man (restored, with intro and outro commentary) (1949, film noir, imdb score: 6.6)

sources.title: The Undercover Man (restored, with intro and outro commentary) (1949, film noir, imdb score: 6.6)
sources.description: The Undercover Man is a 1949 American crime film noir starring Glenn Ford and Nina Foch , and directed by Joseph H. Lewis . James Whitmore made his film debut in support.
